diff_act: 1.replace a departing player with a Computer Opponent (CO) if a user exits before the conclusion of the rounds

regen.absent_element: replacing a departing player with a CO when a user exits early
regen.new_specification: If a user departs the game before the conclusion of the rounds, the system shall replace the departing player with a Computer Opponent (CO).

regen.absent_element: Replacement of a departing user with a Computer Opponent (CO)
regen.new_specification: If a user exits before the conclusion of the rounds, the system shall replace them with a Computer Opponent (CO) to maintain the integrity of the game.

regen.absent_element: situation when a user departs early
regen.new_specification: If a user exits the game before the completion of all 4 rounds, the system shall replace them with a Computer Opponent (CO) to continue the gameplay.

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
